com.iha.emulator.utilities

Class Utilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.iha.emulator.utilities.Utilities

  • public class Utilities
extends java.lang.Object
    Class implemented by Singleton pattern. Provides method used across all of application, for example converting, distribution generators, loading of properties, showing dialogs, etc.
    Author:
    Filip Sutovsky

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Utilities.SaveAdaptersOption
      Enum with options to save adapters presented when application is closing
      static class  Utilities.SaveTasksOption
      Enum with options to save simulation tasks presented when application is closing

      • loadDefaultProperties

        public java.util.Properties loadDefaultProperties(java.lang.String propertiesFileName)
                                           throws java.io.IOException
        Method loads .properties file, with filename given as parameter, and loads it's properties. If filename cannot be found, one is created from resources.
        Parameters:
        propertiesFileName - .properties file location
        Returns:
        properties loaded from .properties file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - cannot copy properties file from resources

      • buildServersFromProperties

                                                                                   javafx.beans.property.LongProperty progress)
                                                                            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Build Server models from properties file.
        Parameters:
        properties - properties with server information
        progress - loading dialog progress property
        Returns:
        list of server models created from properties
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - cannot process information from properties to server information

        header - dialog header
        e - exception

      • generateRefreshTime

        public static int generateRefreshTime(java.util.Random generator,
                                      int min,
                                      int max)
                               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Method, with help of given generator, generates refresh time in given range
        Parameters:
        generator - generator to be used
        min - minimal refresh time, represented as index of option in REFERSH_TIME_OPTIONS array
        max - maximal refresh time, represented as index of option in REFERSH_TIME_OPTIONS array
        Returns:
        generated refresh time
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - generator is null or max is less then min

                      throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Gets index of searched option in given array
        Parameters:
        toSearch - option to be searched for
        tab - array of options
        Returns:
        index of searched option in given array
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if option doesn't exist

      • refreshSliderScaleToSeconds

        public static int refreshSliderScaleToSeconds(double scaleNo)
        GUI refresh slider scale number ( 0 - REFRESH_SLIDER_VALUE_COUNT to seconds. Each scale index represents number from REFERSH_TIME_OPTIONS array.
        Parameters:
        scaleNo - scale index
        Returns:
        seconds from slider

      • secondsToRefershSliderScale

        public static double secondsToRefershSliderScale(int seconds)
        Seconds to GUI refresh slider scale number ( 0 - REFRESH_SLIDER_VALUE_COUNT. Each scale index represents number from REFERSH_TIME_OPTIONS array.
        Parameters:
        seconds - seconds to be converted
        Returns:
        scale index

      • normalDistribution

        public static double normalDistribution(java.util.Random generator,
                                        int accuracy,
                                        double dev,
                                        double avg,
                                        double max,
                                        double min)
                                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Generates new value from current one using normal distribution with accuracy given as parameters. Accuracy = 10 for 1 decimal, 100 for to decimals, ...
        Parameters:
        generator - generator to be used
        accuracy - accuracy of new number
        dev - normal distribution deviation
        avg - normal distribution average
        max - normal distribution max
        min - normal distribution min
        Returns:
        new value
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if generator is null or max is less then min

      • linearDistribution

        public static double linearDistribution(double value,
                                        double step,
                                        double max,
                                        double min)
                                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Generates new value from current one using linear distribution. Step is added to current value, if new value is bigger then maximal value, maximal value is returned. If new value is lower then minimal value, minimal value is returned.
        Parameters:
        value - current value
        step - linear distribution step
        max - maximal value
        min - minimal value
        Returns:
        new value
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - max is less then min

      • booleanRandomGenerate

        public static boolean booleanRandomGenerate(boolean value,
                                            double probability,
                                            java.util.Random generator)
                                     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        According to probability, boolean value is switched to opposite value. If randomly generated number between 0.0 and 1.0 is lower or equal to given probability, value is switched. Otherwise value stays same.
        Parameters:
        value - current value
        probability - switch probability
        generator - generator used to generate random number
        Returns:
        new value
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if generator is null

      • generateIntInRange

        public static int generateIntInRange(java.util.Random generator,
                                     int min,
                                     int max)
                              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Generates random number in given range.
        Parameters:
        generator - used generator
        min - range minimum
        max - range maximum
        Returns:
        random number in given range
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if generator is null or max is less then min

        private boolean checkIfExists(java.lang.String filename)
        Checks, if given filename exists
        Parameters:
        filename - filename to be checked
        Returns:
        true if file exists, false otherwise

        Parameters:
